law.catch_line: Passbook notice required of federally uninsured association.
law.text: Any savings and loan association that is not fully insured by the Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corporation shall, in any advertisement, on all passbooks and all other printed forms of communication carry the following statement: "This association is not federally insured."
law.history: Created 1972 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 5(1).

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). In accordance with 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 247, secs. 38 and 39, this statute has been renumbered as a section of the Kentucky Financial Services Code, KRS Chapter 286.
